title: Postman Automated Testing
description: A comprehensive testing suite for API endpoints using Postman, with automated tests and CI/CD integration. This project is already utilized in an enterprise product.

title: Restaurant Chat Assistant (Concept Project)
description: A chatbot that can assist customers in making reservations, answering questions about the menu, and providing recommendations based on their preferences.

title: Key-phrase API (Concept Project)
technologies: .NET • Azure AI Language Service • Azure Functions
description: A RESTful API that extracts key phrases from a given text using natural language processing techniques.

title: Weather Forecast App (Concept Project)
description: A mobile application that provides accurate weather forecasts, alerts, and historical weather data for multiple locations.

title: AI Image Classifier (Concept Project)
description: A machine learning application that automatically categorizes and tags images using deep learning algorithms.
